results.content:
I believe you need to adjust the data view for starters. Try clicking the field name you want to render in a special way on the left side of Discover then click edit (Edit data view field pops up).

Here are the docs, even though they didn't help me much: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/kibana/8.16/managing-data-views.html#field-formatters-date
Make sure you are in the custom-random-logz data view for this one!

Not the data!

![](https://media1.giphy.com/media/qN9x0UIc0Rhg4/200w.gif?cid=6c09b952q6k3us6dh9m3dgek4fnqmti482nhgbfgmdk0r3mg&ep=v1_gifs_search&rid=200w.gif&ct=g)

Check out the search itself (not the queries, not the results).
